learning_objective: Recommend improvements to the design of computing devices, based on an analysis of how users interact with the devices.
question_str:
{
    "Question": "The school volleyball team has been using a computer program to track their statistics during matches, such as the number of points scored or the number of times the serve was successful.  The program is difficult to use during matches because the players have to search for the correct buttons to press.  What improvements could be made to the design of the computer program to make it more user-friendly during matches?",
    "Answer1": "Use a touchscreen interface",
    "Answer2": "Include larger buttons",
    "Answer3": "Create a voice-controlled program",
    "Answer4": "Include a search bar",
    "CorrectAnswer": "1, 2, 4",
    "Explanation": "A touchscreen interface would make it easier for the players to quickly press the correct buttons, as they could just tap the screen. Larger buttons would also make it easier for the players to find and press the correct buttons. Finally, a search bar would allow the players to quickly find the statistic they are looking for."
}
